com.ibm.pzsdk

Class DeviceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.pzsdk.DeviceInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PIDeviceInfo

    public abstract class DeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class encapsulates what is required by the PI management server for device registration. The only method abstracted here is getDescriptor(). This allows for developers to use this class and provide their own process for generating the device descriptor.
